subject: refactor: implement rose gold metallic theme with refined UI
body:
Visual Refinements:
- Updated theme palette to sophisticated rose gold/champagne metallic
- Primary color: #C9A57B (rose gold) with bronze accents
- Semantic colors: emerald success, softer rose error, amber warning
- All colors have warm metallic tints for cohesive aesthetic

UI Improvements:
- Reduced glass blur from 20px to 12px (less overwhelming)
- Softened create button shadow (height 6→4, opacity 0.4→0.3)
- Fixed button contrast (dark text on light gradient)
- Softened delete button (15% opacity bg + subtle border vs harsh red)
- Increased background pattern visibility (8-15% opacity)
- Applied ChatBackground to all screens (create, join, chat)

Tutorial Updates:
- Removed emoji icons for cleaner look
- Updated button names ("New Chat" → "Create Chat")
- Simplified notification instructions
- Updated tone color descriptions to match metallic theme
- Modernized language throughout

The theme now feels classy, premium, and sophisticated while maintaining
the deep dark aesthetic with subtle metallic shimmer.
title: implement rose gold metallic theme with refined UI
